px-submenu
============

## Using px-submenu

`px-submenu` is a simple sub-menu item.


```html
    <px-menu>
        <px-item>Option 1</px-item>
        <px-item>Option 2</px-item>
        <px-submenu label_val="Option 3">
            <px-item>Sub Option 1</px-item>
            <px-item>Sub Option 2</px-item>
            <px-item>Sub Option 3</px-item>
        </px-submenu>
    </px-menu>
```
